traits.name: Detect Invisibility
traits.desc: Within 50 feet of the tressym, magical invisibility fails to conceal anything from the tressym's sight

traits.name: Keen Smell
traits.desc: The tressym has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

traits.name: Poison Sense
traits.desc: The tressym can detect whether a substance is poisonous by taste, touch, or smell.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +0 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1 slashing damage.
